channel.title: quantum computing on Armoghan
channel.description: Recent content in quantum computing on Armoghan

item.title: Quantum Computing
item.description: Introduction Quantum computing is a new field of computing that is based on the principles of quantum mechanics. Unlike classical computing, which uses bits to represent information as either a 0 or a 1, quantum computing uses quantum bits, or qubits, which can represent a 0, a 1, or both at the same time. This allows quantum computers to perform certain types of calculations much faster than classical computers. How does it work?
